title: Fancierstudio 6664H Quick Release Tripod Grip Action Ball Head by fancierstudio
description:
This is a high quality pro ball head with calibrated tension control for smooth precision movement. Independent control for pan and tilt movement.

This ball head is made from the latest metal (aluminum alloy) technology that provides super strong and sturdy construction and yet weighs only 1-1/4 lbs. a amazing 40% less than a comparable unit. Height: 4.5 inches.

The ball has a 39mm (1.5 inches) diameter which provides super smooth movement and super strong grip. The base has a wide diameter of 1.7 inches for 360 degree precision pan measurement.

The quick release plate system is universal, compatible to all major brands, including the most popular Manfrotto 3157N. The 3157N plates is to show its compatibility and is not part of this transaction. Redundant plate lock and safety lock provides secure mounting of your camera.

Screw size: 1/4 inch for camera; 3/8 inch for tripods (we can provide adapter to fit 1/4 inch pods).
